entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1 except 6 in a few localities.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1 except 6 in a few localities. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
